mapper.sql: id, order_time, total, customer_id, waiter_id, address_id
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from ej_order
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert:
insert into ej_order
id,
order_time,
total,
customer_id,
waiter_id,
address_id,
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{orderTime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{total,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
#{customerId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{waiterId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{addressId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
mapper.update:
update ej_order
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
order_time = #{record.orderTime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
total = #{record.total,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
customer_id = #{record.customerId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
waiter_id = #{record.waiterId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
address_id = #{record.addressId,jdbcType=BIGINT},

update ej_order set id = #{record.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, order_time = #{record.orderTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, total = #{record.total,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, customer_id = #{record.customerId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, waiter_id = #{record.waiterId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, address_id = #{record.addressId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update ej_order
order_time = #{orderTime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
total = #{total,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
customer_id = #{customerId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
waiter_id = #{waiterId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
address_id = #{addressId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update ej_order set order_time = #{orderTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, total = #{total,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, customer_id = #{customerId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, waiter_id = #{waiterId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, address_id = #{addressId,jdbcType=BIGINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select distinct o.id as o_id, o.total as total, o.status as status, o.order_time as orderTime, w.realname as waiterName, a.city as address, d.name as productname, t1.number as Number from ej_order o,ej_waiter w,ej_address a,ej_product d,ej_order_line f,(select t1.o_id,t1.productname,count(*) as number from (select distinct o.id as o_id, o.total as total, o.status as status, o.number as number, o.order_time as orderTime, w.realname as waiterName, a.city as address, d.name as productname from ej_order o,ej_waiter w,ej_address a,ej_product d,ej_order_line f where o.waiter_id = w.id AND o.address_id = a.id AND o.id=f.order_id AND f.product_id=d.id AND f.order_id in(select f.order_id from ej_order_line f1 where f.product_id=f1.product_id and f.order_id=f1.order_id) AND o.status = 'over' ) t1,(select o.id as o_id, o.total as total, o.status as status, o.number as number, o.order_time as orderTime, w.realname as waiterName, a.city as address, d.name as productname from ej_order o,ej_waiter w,ej_address a,ej_product d,ej_order_line f where o.waiter_id = w.id AND o.address_id = a.id AND o.id=f.order_id AND f.product_id=d.id AND f.order_id in(select f.order_id from ej_order_line f1 where f.product_id=f1.product_id and f.order_id=f1.order_id) AND o.status = 'over' ) t2 where t1.o_id=t2.o_id and t1.productname=t2.productname group by t1.o_id,t1.productname) t1 where o.waiter_id = w.id AND o.address_id = a.id AND o.id=f.order_id AND f.product_id=d.id AND f.order_id in(select f.order_id from ej_order_line f1 where f.product_id=f1.product_id and f.order_id=f1.order_id) AND o.status = 'over' AND o.id=t1.o_id

select distinct o.id as o_id, o.total as total, o.status as status, o.order_time as orderTime, w.realname as waiterName, a.city as address, d.name as productname, t1.number as Number from ej_order o,ej_waiter w,ej_address a,ej_product d,ej_order_line f,(select t1.o_id,t1.productname,count(*) as number from (select distinct o.id as o_id, o.total as total, o.status as status, o.number as number, o.order_time as orderTime, w.realname as waiterName, a.city as address, d.name as productname from ej_order o,ej_waiter w,ej_address a,ej_product d,ej_order_line f where o.waiter_id = w.id AND o.address_id = a.id AND o.id=f.order_id AND f.product_id=d.id AND f.order_id in(select f.order_id from ej_order_line f1 where f.product_id=f1.product_id and f.order_id=f1.order_id) AND o.status = 'wait' ) t1,(select o.id as o_id, o.total as total, o.status as status, o.number as number, o.order_time as orderTime, w.realname as waiterName, a.city as address, d.name as productname from ej_order o,ej_waiter w,ej_address a,ej_product d,ej_order_line f where o.waiter_id = w.id AND o.address_id = a.id AND o.id=f.order_id AND f.product_id=d.id AND f.order_id in(select f.order_id from ej_order_line f1 where f.product_id=f1.product_id and f.order_id=f1.order_id) AND o.status = 'wait' ) t2 where t1.o_id=t2.o_id and t1.productname=t2.productname group by t1.o_id,t1.productname) t1 where o.waiter_id = w.id AND o.address_id = a.id AND o.id=f.order_id AND f.product_id=d.id AND f.order_id in(select f.order_id from ej_order_line f1 where f.product_id=f1.product_id and f.order_id=f1.order_id) AND o.status = 'wait' AND o.id=t1.o_id

select distinct o.id as o_id, o.total as total, o.status as status, o.order_time as orderTime, w.realname as waiterName, a.city as address, d.name as productname, t1.number as Number from ej_order o,ej_waiter w,ej_address a,ej_product d,ej_order_line f,(select t1.o_id,t1.productname,count(*) as number from (select distinct o.id as o_id, o.total as total, o.status as status, o.number as number, o.order_time as orderTime, w.realname as waiterName, a.city as address, d.name as productname from ej_order o,ej_waiter w,ej_address a,ej_product d,ej_order_line f where o.waiter_id = w.id AND o.address_id = a.id AND o.id=f.order_id AND f.product_id=d.id AND f.order_id in(select f.order_id from ej_order_line f1 where f.product_id=f1.product_id and f.order_id=f1.order_id) AND o.status = 'finish' ) t1,(select o.id as o_id, o.total as total, o.status as status, o.number as number, o.order_time as orderTime, w.realname as waiterName, a.city as address, d.name as productname from ej_order o,ej_waiter w,ej_address a,ej_product d,ej_order_line f where o.waiter_id = w.id AND o.address_id = a.id AND o.id=f.order_id AND f.product_id=d.id AND f.order_id in(select f.order_id from ej_order_line f1 where f.product_id=f1.product_id and f.order_id=f1.order_id) AND o.status = 'finish' ) t2 where t1.o_id=t2.o_id and t1.productname=t2.productname group by t1.o_id,t1.productname) t1 where o.waiter_id = w.id AND o.address_id = a.id AND o.id=f.order_id AND f.product_id=d.id AND f.order_id in(select f.order_id from ej_order_line f1 where f.product_id=f1.product_id and f.order_id=f1.order_id) AND o.status = 'finish' AND o.id=t1.o_id

select c.id as c_id, c.order_time, c.total, c.customer_id, c.waiter_id, c.address_id, t.id as t_id, t.realname, t.password, d.id as d_id, d.realname, d.status, e.id as e_id, e.address, e.telephone from ej_order c left join ej_customer t on c.customer_id=t.id left join ej_waiter d on c.customer_id=d.id left join ej_address e on c.customer_id=e.id where c.id=#{id}
